Package com.fssa.projectprovision.dao

Class TaskDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.dao.TaskDAO
public class TaskDAO extends Object
The TaskDAO class provides methods for accessing and manipulating task data in the database. This class is responsible for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting tasks. Usage: TaskDAO taskDAO = new TaskDAO(); List allTasks = taskDAO.getAllTasks(); Task task = taskDAO.getTaskById(taskId); // Use the methods to interact with the database and manipulate Task records
Author:
JayaprakashJaisankar

      The TaskDAO class provides methods for accessing and manipulating task data in the database. This class is responsible for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting tasks.

  • Method Details

    • createTask

      public boolean createTask(Task task) throws DAOException
      Creates a new task in the database.
      Parameters:
      task - The Task object containing the task information to be created.
      Returns:
      True if the task creation was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the database operation.

    • getAllTasks

      public static List<Task> getAllTasks() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of all tasks from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of Task objects representing all tasks in the database.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the database operation.

    • getTaskById

      public static Task getTaskById(int taskId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a task from the database based on the provided task ID.
      Parameters:
      taskId - The ID of the task to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Task object representing the retrieved task.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the database operation.

    • updateTask

      public static boolean updateTask(Task task) throws DAOException
      Updates an existing task in the database.
      Parameters:
      task - The Task object containing the updated task information.
      Returns:
      True if the task update was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the database operation.

    • deleteTask

      public static boolean deleteTask(int taskId) throws DAOException
      Deletes a task from the database based on the provided task ID.
      Parameters:
      taskId - The ID of the task to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the task deletion was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there's an issue with the database operation.
